sentences.english: In cesarean section, the peritoneum should be sutured to provide a favorable condition for next operation.
sentences.chinese: 行剖宫产术时应缝合腹膜，为下次手术创造有利条件。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the causes, diagnosis and treatment of retroperitoneal abscesses.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腹膜后脓肿的病因，诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Results There were significant changes in diaphragmatic peritoneal mesothelium and lymphatic capillaries.
sentences.chinese: 结果膈腹膜间皮和膈毛细淋巴管均发生了明显的变化。

sentences.english: The ventral nerve cord is covered externally by a peritoneum.
The peritoneum then reabsorbs the fluid.
sentences.chinese: 而腹膜则会吸收这些液体。

sentences.english: The peritoneum is a biologic semi-permeable membrane.
It is a self-limited disease and has a benign prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 嗜伊红性腹膜炎为一自限性疾病且预后良好。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the diagnostic value of spiral CT to tuberculous peritonitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨结核性腹膜炎的螺旋CT检查方法及其特征。

sentences.english: Objective To study the recurrent mechanism and prognosis of primary retroperitoneal liposarcoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨原发性腹膜后脂肪肉瘤复发的机理及预后。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the CT diagnosis of primary retroperitoneal tumors(PRNs).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨原发性腹膜后肿瘤的CT诊断价值。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the diagnosis and treatment of PRT .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腹膜后肿瘤的诊断与治疗方法。

sentences.english: The uterus and retroperitoneum appear to be the most frequent sites of origin for these lesions.
sentences.chinese: 子宫和腹膜后似乎是最常见的发病部位。

sentences.english: These neoplasms can reach a large size in the retroperitoneum before detection.
sentences.chinese: 被查出之前，往往在腹膜后腔能长得很大。

sentences.english: Another form of dialysis is called peritoneal dialysis.
sentences.chinese: 另外一个透析方式称之为腹膜透析。

sentences.english: Patients with generalized peritonitis and a history of abdominal surgery were excluded.
sentences.chinese: 有弥漫性腹膜炎和既往腹部手术史者除外。

sentences.english: There was no association between RPH and arterial sheath size or deployment of a vascular closure device.
sentences.chinese: 腹膜后血肿与动脉导管尺寸和血管缝合器的应用无关。

definition: serosa/serous membrane (smooth moist delicate membranes lining body cavities)
pleural cavity (part of thorax containing lungs)
sigmoid colon (anatomy)/bent colon, linking the descending colon to the rectum
transverse colon (anatomy)/second section of large intestine
